Text:
Remember, the quality is VHS. This was a made for TV movie in 1989.  Don't wait for BluRay on this one, ain't gonna happen.  Yet it remains best fictionalized account and heavily awared as a drama on this topic.

PLEASE PLEASE download and seed.  I can't do it for long, and when this sucker dies, it is gone forever.  I actually broke down and bought it for this purpose.
